name: VelvetNoiseforSleep
0:
”Alexa open velvet noise”
”Alexa ask velvet noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: velvet noise
des: Velvet Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. Velvet Noise is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Velvet Noise, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
